An International Business Times: IBT) article from 2 February 2017 reported that an anonymous source called "Axios" claimed that President Trump said male staffers should wear ties and women must "dress like women."
The IBT article appeared to be sourced e: s personality and preferences, rather than from a documented White House dress code enforced by the new administration.
